entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
